name: Super Lost
description:
A little game I made when I was college. We had a week to make a game about being lost. Pretty straight forward.

I'm sure we've all had that time when we were young and we got separated from our family while we were out shopping. For me, personally, this was about getting lost in a supermarket.

It's kind of rough, but I did only make it in a week. 
(Haha, I really just thought I should upload more than... once every other year.)

Made with FlixelHaxe.
